title.narrative: Améliorer les données, l'économie et l'agriculture au Moyen-Orient et en Afrique du Nord
Enhancing Data, Economy, and Agriculture in the Middle East and North Africa

description.narrative:
This grant will support activities that foster collaboration across IDRC programs and contribute to Canada's presence in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA).
IDRC's regional office in Cairo will fund four key activities:
-Produce a policy road map for data-driven innovation in the region. The road map will identify concrete steps governments and businesses can take to harness data-driven innovation in the areas of food security and youth employment.
-Train government and media communicators in the skills and tools needed to research, analyze, organize, and visualize data to produce more interactive forms of journalism and policy analysis.
-Hold an event to examine the links between agriculture and employment.
-Enhance development of IDRC-funded projects in the region by providing travel grants and grant administration support to prospective recipients.
